title: R5s/OOL Team FuroX LF D5+ Mid sub Top sub also Adc Sub trails tomorrow
body:
Requirements
* On and active around 7pm till 11pm (for the begining though try to be on as frequenlty so we can try u out quickly)
* Diamond + if lower add me and ill sus u out
* Positive attitude
* Except Criticism
* Have previous experience in teams plz
* lastly Respect the players and captain and you will have a good time 

add me and i can trail u asap IGN BEEFYBill also any question ask 

best of luck trying out and hope u make a new addition to the team
